text: Traversodon is an extinct genus of cynodonts. It was a relative of the direct ancestor to modern mammals. Traversodon lived in what is now South America. ==Species== Traversodon stahleckeri was first found by Friedrich von Huene in 1936 in the Geopark of Paleorrota, São Pedro do Sul, Brazil. ==References== * Paleobiology Database * UNIVERSIDADE DO RIO GRANDE DO SUL Category:Cynognathian genera Category:Late Triassic synapsids of South America Category:Fossil taxa described in 1936 Category:Taxa named by Friedrich von Huene
title: Traversodon
